hero.title: Your Step-by-Step ${industry} Business Starter Kit
hero.subtitle: Our free, step-by-step guide will help you start your business today.

solutions.title: Knowing exactly what your ${industry} business needs to get started can be difficult.
solutions.subtitle: Business.NJ.gov provides a free, personalized Starter Kit unique to you and your business needs.

card1.title: Check your application status
card1.body: You can check the status of various applications for licenses and permits you may need to run your business.

card2.title: Find funding and certifications for your business
card2.body: You can see what funding and certifications fit your business needs by answering just a few questions.

card3.title: Learn about business licenses
card3.body: Your personalized guide will help you understand what licenses your business needs to operate in New Jersey.
